content: Truly a great choice of topic! I love reading and constantly read… not only is seeing your list inspiring and helpful to me and my book collection, but it also has inspired me to do the same. I’m going to use the same subject and write my own, I hope you won’t mind, just imagine if more people did this? Amazing. I’ll reference you in my writing as I don’t want to appear to be “taking” or anything negative like that :) Be blessed!
